messages.title: Putting people first
messages.content: The key jobs of the UK Labour government are to secure the economy and invest properly in all our futures. Don't let the Tories stop us from delivering the changes that will improve all our lives.

messages.title: Standing up for Falkirk
messages.content: Every single hardworking family deserves security in difficult times. Help like Working Families Tax Credit, poverty rights in Child Benefit, better maternity and paternity rights and the Child Trust Fund. The Labour government has doubled the Scottish economy and I plan secure jobs and decent homes at the top of my own agenda.

messages.title: The Change we see around us
messages.content: A new hospital, new schools, the Falkirk Wheel, and a lot more, proof that the changes we promised the electorate are there for the keeping with your help the projects most important to you are closer to being completed. Such as the Kelpies and Helix project, with funding secured by Labour to help strengthen the economy and improve local amenities. Regeneration in Denny, Camelon and other parts of the Falkirk area are a huge Labour priority.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Every single new or saved job provides a more secure future for Falkirk people.
Proud of the Winter Fuel Allowance and Pension Credits. Must index-link the state pension, acting on anti-social behaviour and the lives of decent folk.
Under Labour a brand new Hospital has been built in Falkirk.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Improving education in the Falkirk area
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Falkirk's schools have been rebuilt. We should all be proud of our fantastic teachers. They must be properly funded for our wee ones.

issues.economy: The Labour government has doubled the Scottish economy.
issues.education: Falkirk's schools have been rebuilt. Teachers must be properly funded.
issues.health: Under Labour a brand new Hospital has been built in Falkirk.
issues.socialWelfare: Winter Fuel Allowance and Pension Credits.

housing.content: Plan secure jobs and decent homes.

quotes.text: The key jobs of the UK Labour government are to secure the economy and invest properly in all our futures. Don't let the Tories stop us from delivering the changes that will improve all our lives.
